name: UnionSex of patient assigned at birthAndUSCoreBirthSexExtension
title: Union of Sex of patient assigned at birth And US Core Birth Sex Extension

element.definition: A code classifying the person's sex assigned at birth  as specified by the [Office of the National Coordinator for Health IT (ONC)].
element.comment: left: The codes required are intended to present birth sex (i.e., the sex recorded on the patientâ€™s birth certificate) and not gender identity or reassigned sex.; right: The codes required are intended to present birth sex (i.e., the sex recorded on the patient's birth certificate) and not gender identity or reassigned sex.
